nodes.text: BXL-99 labor droids, often referred to as Bee-Ex-Ell-Ninety-nines, were a type of labor droid. Standing about two meters tall, they were very heavy, and were equipped with a pair of three-pronged pincers. Three such droids were present in Coruscant's Factory District droid plant, until they were destroyed by Jedi-in-hiding Jax Pavan and the protocol droid I-5YQ.
